name: MICH vs IRU: The Wizardry Games
name_original: MICH vs IRU: The Wizardry Games
description:
MICH vs IRU : The Wizardry Games is a multiplayer friendly game about wizards fighting using mirrors as protection. 

    You have to own 2 controllers to play the game. (Any controller will do the job, just map the buttons to those of an XBox Controller)

    Create your own wand depending on your gameplay preferences. Over 35 possibilities for 7 spells. Destroy your opponent in 3 rounds.
